title: [1.7.10][ssp/smp][Forge] Fast Food Mod-快餐[点击就送美味的汉堡包！]
author: 740s
txt_content:
本帖最后由 740s 于 2015-4-19 12:58 编辑 


汉堡包？！薯条？！...！哇！！！这就是传说中的——快餐mod啊！！


此mod一共新增加了38中新物品。个个新增加的汉堡包们都是香气扑鼻散发着扑鼻的诱人的香味.......
好了！说正事！先上作者原话：
Hunting down someone to make a good cover photo! Maybe an item texturer? 

Special blocks:Red power mod (not affiliated) 
mod: 
Are you tired of eating plain old steak and porkchops?  Is your game becoming stale with the same food every day? Well here's a solution! Download the Subway Sandwich mod! It provides several sandwiches from he menu of the franchise Subway! With fully functioning recipes and semi-easy obtainable food items, you'll never starve again! 
You need Forge! 
Install Instructions: Place jar file into the mods folder 

If you crash: 
Install forge 
Conflicting IDs (inform me which mod) 
Did not properly download the mod 
  

Temporarily the only way to obtain: lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, onions and peppers is by breaking grass (Not the blocks but the plant) 既然是快餐咯，那我就别废话了，相信大家都懂的......下面介绍下这个mod
哦！玩MC久了，发现食物的多样性少得可怜！怎么办？这个mod可以满足你的食欲！！！！
这个mod的食物都是大家的最爱——汉堡包们，几乎次mod里的食物增加的饱食度都很高！那就不必看着单调的牛排猪排什么的发呆了！！












喜欢就用人气金粒砸死我！你们的支持是我最大的动力！！！！
最后！让我们一起手握鼠标，点击下载地址，然后高呼：下载！

下载地址


The End

replies.txt_content: 连续看到两个很不错的mod，全是外网下载，根本看不懂，跟不要说找到{:10_533:}
